transfiguration.name: Avifors Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Trace a circular motion with the wand, encouraging the object to take wing.
transfiguration.effect: This spell transforms small objects and creatures into non‑magical birds. It works best on inanimate targets and may produce unpredictable results when used on living things.
transfiguration.notes: Transfiguration students practise Avifors to hone their control over conjuration and transformation. Repeated use can exhaust the caster and the conjured birds vanish after a short time.

sources.ref: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 2

transfiguration.name: Beetles to Buttons
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Turns beetles and insects like it, into simple buttons. Fancier beetles make fancier buttons.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Bird‑Conjuring Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Point the wand skyward and snap it to the side while intoning the incantation.
transfiguration.effect: This conjuration spell produces a flock of small birds that burst from the wand tip with a gun‑like report. The birds fly around the area for a brief time before dissipating or being dismissed by the caster.
transfiguration.notes: It is one of the easier living‑creature conjurations but still requires strong concentration and precise wand movement. Sixth‑year Transfiguration students practise Avis, and conjured birds cannot be controlled to attack others.

transfiguration.name: Bleaching Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Almost superfluous in nature; a charm that bleaches a single nonliving, inorganic target completely of colour. The does not become white but a sad and lifeless shade of grey.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Bouquet Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Draw a circle in the air and flick to release a pink light.
transfiguration.effect: This conjuration produces a bouquet of flowers from the caster’s wand tip. The conjured blossoms are real but non‑magical and fade away after a brief period.
transfiguration.notes: The spell is popular around festive occasions and is often practised by fourth‑year transfiguration students. Conjured flowers cannot be used as potion ingredients or for further transfiguration.

sources.ref: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 4

transfiguration.name: Chaining Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Binds the subject with iron chains, which wrap around the body and lock on wrists and ankles. Instantaneous.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Chicken Jinx
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Pullus is the incantation of a transforming jinx used to transfigure the target into a chicken. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Colour Change Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Wave the wand in a small loop and flick toward the object, visualising the desired colour.
transfiguration.effect: The Colour Change Charm alters the hue of a target object to any colour the caster imagines【317766280468383†L465-L500】. Mispronouncing the incantation or confusing it with the Growth Charm can cause the object to swell instead of change colour.
transfiguration.notes: Fifth‑year students practise this charm to differentiate its incantation from similar spells【317766280468383†L465-L500】. It is useful for decorating, disguising items or creating visual effects, but should not be used on creatures without consent.

transfiguration.name: Draconifors Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Slash the wand in a downward arc and snap it back upward sharply.
transfiguration.effect: This powerful transfiguration spell turns a small inanimate object into a miniature dragon that breathes harmless sparks. The tiny dragon can be controlled by the caster and will revert to its original form after a short time.
transfiguration.notes: The spell is considered advanced due to the complexity of creating a controlled magical creature. Proper supervision is required because even miniature dragons can cause chaos if mishandled.

transfiguration.name: Ducklifors
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: When it hits the target, there is a burst of yellow light and when said light fades, the target is in the shape of a duck. Proficient users of this spell can control the appearance of the duck, the weight, and size.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Engorgement Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Sweep the wand upward in a large circle as if enlarging the space around the object.
transfiguration.effect: The Engorgement Charm causes the target to swell, enlarging it well beyond its normal size【111330277891909†L464-L479】. Over‑enthusiastic casting can make the object explode, so the charm is often paired with the Shrinking Charm to restore objects to normal【111330277891909†L476-L484】.
transfiguration.notes: This charm is taught to second‑year students and appears in The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 2【111330277891909†L476-L484】. Wizards are cautioned to avoid using it on living creatures without medical supervision.

transfiguration.name: Extension Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: The Extension Charm (Capacious extremis) is a charm that expands the internal dimensions of an object without affecting the external dimensions, enhancing its capacity, and rendering its contents lighter. Advanced magic.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Fish Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Piscifors is the incantation of a transforming spell that can be used to transform the target into a fish. Professor Horace Slughorn described it as being beautiful.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Flower Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Herbifors is the incantation for a transforming spell that turns the target into a bunch of flowers. It can work on an individual's head of hair.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Hairstyle Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Crinus Muto was the incantation of a transfiguration spell that could be used to transform the colour and style of the caster's hair. Taught in sixth year transfiguration at Hogwarts.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Hardening Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Tap the object firmly then trace a small square in the air.
transfiguration.effect: When cast, this charm transforms a targeted object into solid stone, creating a durable barrier or weight. The hardened state lasts until dispelled and can be used creatively to block passages or fortify defences.
transfiguration.notes: Miranda Goshawk notes that students sometimes use the Hardening Charm to sabotage their classmates’ schoolbags and warns that it should never be cast on living beings【192874913736380†L460-L468】. It is taught in third‑year Transfiguration classes and appears in the Book of Spells as a useful defensive transfiguration.

transfiguration.name: Homorphus Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Causes an Animagus or transfigured object to assume its normal shape. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Incarcerous Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Ties someone or something up with ropes. It conjures thick ropes or thin cords from "thin air", that bind whatever the caster is pointing their wand at.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Insect Hex
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: The Insect Hex (Entomorphis), also known as the Insect Jinx, was a dark charm that could be used to induce insect-like qualities upon a victim for a short period of time. It deprived them of their ability to speak, forcing them to crawl about and endowing them with feelers.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Lapifors Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Point the wand directly at a small object and give a short jab.
transfiguration.effect: This spell transforms a small object or creature into a rabbit under the control of the caster. It works best on inanimate targets and produces a harmless, non‑magical rabbit that eventually returns to its original form.
transfiguration.notes: Transfiguration students learn Lapifors to practise controlled transformations. The caster may mentally direct the conjured rabbit, making it useful for puzzle‑solving but not combat.

transfiguration.name: Matchbox Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Flintifors is the incantation of a Transfiguration spell that turned the target small object into a matchbox. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Mirror Conjuration Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Conjures a frameless mirror seemingly out of thin air. Lasts for minutes depending on the skill of the caster.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Multicorfors Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: The Multicorfors Spell (Multicorfors) is a transfiguration spell that can be used to change the colour and style of the target's outfit. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Pumpkin-Head Jinx
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: The Pumpkin-Head Jinx (Melofors), also known as the Melofors Jinx, is a jinx that encases the victim's head in a pumpkin. To outsiders, it appears that the victim's head is transformed into a pumpkin.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Sealed Mouth Hex
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Causes the lips to close and then painfully knit together until there is no opening. Can be reversed with Finite by a competent witch or wizard, such as Minerva McGonagall.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Shrinking Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Draw a small inward spiral with the wand then point at the target.
transfiguration.effect: The Shrinking Charm reduces the size of an object or creature, miniaturising it to a fraction of its original form【784797293807680†L464-L473】. When cast properly it is reversible, but miscasting can cause uncontrolled shrinking or harm living targets.
transfiguration.notes: This charm is the counterpart to the Engorgement Charm and is usually taught alongside it so students learn to control growth and shrinkage【784797293807680†L464-L477】. It is covered in The Standard Book of Spells and should never be used on humans without supervision.

transfiguration.name: Simple Copy Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Point at what is being copied and flick towards the surface the copy should go on. Mainly for parts of a page, not a full page.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Skull Mutation Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Mutatio Skullus is the incantation to a dark charm which mutates the victim's head. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Snake Summoning Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Conjures a serpent from the spell caster’s wand.The Snake Summons Spell (Serpensortia) is a transfiguration spell that conjures a live snake from the end of the wand. Out of all of the spells used to conjure living things, The Snake Summons Spell was amongst the easiest, alongside the Bird-Conjuring Charm.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Snake Summons Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Slash the wand downward and twist to the right as though uncoiling a rope.
transfiguration.effect: This spell conjures a live snake from the tip of the caster’s wand, typically of a non‑venomous variety. The conjured serpent can be directed by the caster but will vanish after a short time.
transfiguration.notes: Snake‑charming wizards in India were said to have used similar magic centuries ago. Because conjured snakes can bite, the spell is normally reserved for duelling practice under supervision.

transfiguration.name: Snufflifors Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Tap the target book gently on its spine while uttering the spell.
transfiguration.effect: This spell transforms small objects, especially books, into mice. The mice scurry around briefly before turning back into their original form once the magic wears off or the caster ends the spell.
transfiguration.notes: The Snufflifors Spell is a favourite among pranksters but also serves as practice for precise transformations. Students should not use it on valuable texts, as residual teeth marks may persist if the spell is poorly cast.

transfiguration.name: Softening Charm
transfiguration.wand_movements: Bounce the wand in small arcs over the surface to be softened.
transfiguration.effect: The Softening Charm makes hard surfaces spongy and bouncy like rubber, cushioning impacts and causing objects to bounce away【697424262175522†L474-L505】. The effect wears off after a short while, returning the surface to its original firmness.
transfiguration.notes: Students often use Spongify on floor tiles to create makeshift trampolines, though misuse can send unsuspecting people flying【697424262175522†L474-L505】. It is taught in first‑year Charms and second‑year Transfiguration classes and appears in The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 1.

transfiguration.name: Tentacle Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Tentaclifors is the incantation of a charm that transfigures the head of the targeted witch or wizard into a tentacle. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Untransfiguration Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
transfiguration.effect: Reparifarge is the incantation of an untransfiguration spell. It is a general spell used to counter the effects of a Transformation spell that was poorly performed and only partially Transfigured the object in question.This spell is covered in A Beginner's Guide to Transfiguration, which stressed the importance of at least attempting this spell when necessary, as the products of incomplete Transfigurations could be dangerous.
transfiguration.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

transfiguration.name: Vanishing Spell
transfiguration.wand_movements: Trace a shrinking spiral over the target with the tip of the wand.
transfiguration.effect: This transfiguration spell causes objects or creatures to disappear completely, sending them to an unknown location. Vanishing small, simple objects is easier than vanishing complex living creatures, which requires significant skill and focus.
transfiguration.notes: Fifth‑year students at Hogwarts practise vanishing snails before progressing to more complex animals. The spell becomes progressively more difficult as the complexity of the target increases, and misuse can be dangerous.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Activation Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Will activate a deactivated effect of an object, or an effect charmed or enchanted to only occur from an Activation Charm. Counter-charm of and is the Deactication Charm.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Age Line Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes anyone below the specified age who crosses the line to be propelled backwards over it. If the offending wizard has used some means to magically alter his age, the line may also cause him to suffer the extremes of it (such as growing a beard after having taken an Aging Potion, or having one’s skin wrinkle if he tried an Aging Jinx), if the line’s caster is a sufficiently accomplished wizard.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Aguamenti Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Produces a jet of water from the caster's wand. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: All-Stunner
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Stuns multiple people simultaneously. A very powerful or experienced caster can pick and choose targets from a group; a less experienced caster will indiscriminately Stun everyone within range of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Animagus Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Spell used as part of the process of becoming an Animagus. The incantation has to be recited at sunrise and sundown, every day before the consumption of the Animagus Potion.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Ankle Grabber Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Once cast, the hex yanks the victim off their feet by the ankle in the direction of the caster. The caster raises their wand up and back or out to the side and behind to drag the victim in a direction.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Anti-Cheating Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Tap the parchment or quill tip gently while focusing on honesty.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This charm is applied to quills and examination papers to prevent students from cheating during tests. It magically blocks attempts to copy answers or modify a paper without authorisation
charmwork_enchantment.notes: The spell has been used at Hogwarts for centuries as a standard precaution for O.W.L. and N.E.W.T. examinations. Although its incantation is unknown, it may be circumvented by cribbing spells if not carefully maintained.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Antler Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Anteoculatia is the incantation of a charm that grows antlers on the head of the target. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Antonin Dolohov’s Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the complete and permanent cessation of function of whatever it strikes (e.g. a limb would cease to function, internal organs would shut down).
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Apparition
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Apparition is a magical method of transportation. It is basically the magical action of travelling by having the user focus on a desired location in their mind.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Ascending Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Ascendio is the incantation of a charm which flings the caster high into the air. The charm also works underwater, propelling the caster above the surface.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Banishing Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Push the wand sharply away from you as if pushing the object.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Banishing Charm propels objects away from the caster, sending them flying in the opposite direction【263005100699573†L187-L204】. The distance depends on the caster’s control, and the spell should not be used on living beings or breakable objects.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Professor Flitwick advises students to practise Banishing Charms on cushions to avoid accidents and emphasises that it is the counterpart to the Summoning Charm【263005100699573†L187-L204】. It is taught in fourth‑year classes and is a fundamental defensive and household spell.

sources.ref: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 4

charmwork_enchantment.name: Barrier Line
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The line acts as a repelling barrier to those that don't qualify to pass. It recognises people by wand and can be attuned to specific wands to allow them through, provided they have their wands out.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Barrier Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Creates a magical barrier that stops physical objects, but not magic. Used, for example, by wizards to protect themselves against gunshots or other projectile weapons.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Bat-Bogey Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the target’s boogers to become batlike, crawling out of the victim’s nose and growing drastically in size to take flight. The hex itself acts only for a few seconds, though the resulting “bats” will flap around for ten minutes before disintegrating.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Battuo inflammata
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Like a firey battering ram, the curse can be used to burst open doors or push through obstacles. It will force objects out the way, burning them as it goes and appears like a jet of flame.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Bird-Conjuring Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This charm creates a flock of birds from the caster's wand. When coupled with Oppugno, it can be used offensively.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Bleeding Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the target to bleed from one or more points on the head. The weakest use will produce a mild nosebleed, whereas the strongest could make the target bleed voluminously from the ears, nose, eyes, and mouth simultaneously, causing unconsciousness in less than a minute.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Blindfold Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes a blindfold to appear over the victim's eyes, obstructing his/her view of his/her surroundings. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Blinding Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes temporary loss of sight, burning pain to the eyes. Lasts for a few seconds to several minutes.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Blood Flow Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes blood flow from an injury to stop. Does not actually repair the damage, so while the victim will not suffer from blood loss (and the blood will, somewhat disconcertingly, continue to flow along the path of veins that have been opened, even if exposed to open air), he may still be susceptible to gangrene or infection.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Bluebell Flame Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Creates a blue flame that can be moved around without a source, even air. The flames can be sent away from the caster, then transported back to the hand of the caster, or even carried around in a container.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Body-Bind Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Used to temporarily bind the victim's body in a position much like that of a soldier at attention; this spell does not restrict breathing or seeing, and the victim will usually fall to the ground. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Boiling Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the heating of the target, boiling, though only on the target and not the air. Most often used to boil water and other liquids, the larger the volume the more concentration and skill required.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Bone Breaker
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A simple and efficient hex, fractures the recipient's bones. The strength and extent of the fracture depends on how well it is cast (and with how much vehemence).
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Broken Bone Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes major broken bones (which can not be fixed with Episkey) to heal. Takes a few seconds, though the bones may be fragile for a short time.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Bruise Relief Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Heals broken blood vessels within a bruise and returns the skin to normal colouration. Will also work on bruise-related swellings.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Bubble Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Ebublio Jinx (Ebublio) is a jinx that entraps the targeted individual, or indeed any target, in a very large bubble that cannot be popped by physical force. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Bubble-Head Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Puts a large bubble of air around the head of the user. Used as a magical equivalent of a scuba set or self-contained breathing apparatus.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Burn Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes a painful burning sensation on the target, as if he or she has been struck with a red-hot whip. Instantaneous.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Caterwauling Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The charm is activated by any living thing that steps on the area of the charm. Once activated, the charm lets out a high pitched shreik loud enough for anyone in or near the area of the charm to clearly hear it.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Cheering Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Draw a small circle with the wand around the target’s head while smiling.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A Cheering Charm invokes a warm surge of happiness in the recipient, lifting their spirits and banishing gloom【724499413588056†L169-L185】. Over‑enthusiastic casting may provoke fits of hysterical laughter or giddiness.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Invented by Felix Summerbee in the 1400s, the Cheering Charm is taught early in Charms class and is useful for easing tension or cheering friends【724499413588056†L169-L185】. Moderation is essential to avoid leaving the subject incapacitated with giggles.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Clear Airway Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Clears the target's airway, if blocked. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Cloak Burning Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Lacarnum Inflamari is the incantation of a charm used to ignite cloaks or other items of clothing worn by individuals. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Confundus Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the victim to become confused, befuddled, overly forgetful and prone to follow simple orders without thinking about them. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Conjunctivitus Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A curse that causes great pain to the victim's eyes. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Constricting Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the ribs to squeeze unpleasantly on the lungs, resulting in shortness of breath and a compressed heart, which together can cause dizziness or even fainting. Lasts an hour, but easily dispelled.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Constriction Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the ribs to squeeze more violently on the lungs, until the target suffocates or the heart ruptures from the pressure. Takes approximately five minutes until the target blacks out, another five until death.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Containing Shield
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Creates a hard magical barrier, which reflects back the spell directed at it to the target. Will protect more than just the caster.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Cushioning Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Makes an area softer, similar to if it was a pillow. The area which the charm affects usually depends on the intent of the caster as well as the skill and concentration.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Cyclone charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A moderate breeze, whose direction is controlled by the wand bearer, gradually builds up into a cyclone. The longer the charm is used the larger and stronger the wind cyclone.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Dancing Feet Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Makes victim's legs dance uncontrollably, so the victim cannot control his or her movements (recalling the tarantella dance). The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Dangling Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The victim is dangled upside-down by one of his/her ankles, sometimes accompanied by a flash of white light. Created by Severus Snape.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Dark Mark
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Conjures the Dark Mark, Voldemort's mark. It is often used to mark deaths, or cause terror (as at the Quidditch World Cup in The Goblet of Fire)
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Dark Mark barrier
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Creates a magical barrier which can be passed only by someone branded with the Dark Mark. Anyone without a Dark Mark who attempts to pass will be hurled backwards.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Deactivation Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Will deactivate an activated effect of an object, or hault the effects of any charm on an object. Counter-charm of and is the Activation Charm.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Dead Limb Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes living limbs to lose mobility and go completely limp and dangly. Extra strong spellcasts can even make the bone all droopy.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Deafen Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes temporary loss of hearing from a minute to up to half a day. In combination with other curses can cause hearing damage.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Deep Gash Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Deep bloody gashes and diminished strength around the point of impact. The weakening element acts like poison, crippling the victim until he is administered dittany and given rest.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Descending Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Makes things sink, or go down. Descendo is the incantation of a charm that made objects move fall or move downwards.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Disillusionment Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the target to become invisible, or close to it. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Dislocation Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the joint it hits to be dislocated. Will not work on immovable joints.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Dome-Barrier Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Creates a dome-shaped magical barrier that stops physical objects but not magic. Objects coming in contact with the dome tend to slide off it with the natural pull of gravity.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Door Locking Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Magically locks a door, preventing it from being opened by Muggle means. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Doubling Charm/Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Creates a duplicate of any object upon which it is cast. As revealed by the goblin Griphook, any copies created are worthless.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Drawing Animation Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes a drawing to animate to what the caster determines. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Drought Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes small bodies of water (from a puddle to a pond) to dry up; proper casting will consume approximately a gallon per second. Does not work on larger bodies of water.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Drying Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Completely dries whatever is in its path (usually used on clothing or pets), but does not work directly on pools of water. Instantaneous.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Durability Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Fianto Duri is the incantation of a charm that, when combined with a protective spell such as Protego Maxima, can cause magical defences to become hard or more durable. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Echo Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Aim and purpose will send the user's voice echoing in intended direction. Echoes will continue after the charm has been terminated.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Enchantment Revealing Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Reveals the traces of magic, and which specific spells have been used if used quickly enough after the event. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Entrail-Expelling Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Presumably causes the entrails (i.e. intestines) to be ejected from the body.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Evidence Recovery Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Gathers magical traces from an area, if cast sufficiently soon after the magic itself was used. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Expelling Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A spell that causes an object to explode. The force of the explosion may depend on the intent of the caster.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Exploding Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Results in a small explosion. Detonates the target in a small explosion.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Eyeball Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the eyes of the target to turn 180 degrees, so they stare at the inside of the head. Though painless, this spell can be very jarring and frightening, both for the victim and observers.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: False Memory Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the victim to believe a false memory created by the caster is actually true. The victim will act accordingly.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Featherweight Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Makes an object extremely lightweight, so that it can be carried more easily. Lasts a few hours, after which the object in question will grow steadily heavier.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Fidelius Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A charm involving secret information hidden within the soul of a Secret-Keeper. This information is irretrievable until the Secret-Keeper chooses to reveal it; those who have the secret revealed to them cannot reveal it to others.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Fiendfyre Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Creates semi-sentient Dark fire that consumes everything in its path. The flames do not have the physical weaknesses of real fire (i.e., immune to water), and are also resistant to any counter-curses but the specific Fiendfyre Counter (so Finite also does not work).
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Finger Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes all five of the target’s fingers to stick together. Lasts for a few hours.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Fire Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Wraps in fire, a curse to burn alive or destroy by fire a single item. Similar to a flame-thrower, but sentient in that it will wrap itself around a target.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Fire Line Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: With this spell, the caster's wand can leave fiery marks. The shape lingers for some time.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Fire Whip Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes a non-burning, fiery whip to materialize from the caster’s wand. This can be used like a normal whip (i.e.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Fire-Making Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Produces fire. Flames burst out flying.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Fire-Whip Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Acts as any magical flame by severely burning the victim. May scar permanently under extreme cases and especially if unblocked.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Fire‑Making Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Swipe the wand downward and then flick upward sharply toward the tinder.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Fire‑Making Spell conjures a burst of flames from the caster’s wand, igniting wood, torches or fireplaces【512210385647555†L454-L486】. Skilled witches and wizards can adjust the size and intensity of the flames, but misuse can cause burns and property damage.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Introduced in first‑year Charms and Herbology lessons, Incendio is accompanied by strict safety warnings【512210385647555†L500-L506】. Miranda Goshawk advises practising outdoors and never pointing the wand at people, pets or flammable materials you wish to keep.

sources.ref: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 1

charmwork_enchantment.name: Flagrante
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes any object affected to burn human skin when touched. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Flame-Freezing Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes fire to become harmless to those caught in it, creating only a gentle, tickling sensation instead of burns. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Flesh binding spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This spell knits wounds together, starting at the deepest part of the wounded flesh steadily to the skin. Leaves a very minimal scarring if done correctly.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Flying Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Cast on broomsticks, and (presumably) magic carpets to make them fly. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Fogging Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: “Nebulus” is the incantation for a spell that causes fog and then rain to appear (CG). Albus Dumbledore used this spell to obscure himself and Newt Scamander from view
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Four-Point Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the caster's wand tip to point to the north cardinal point, acting like a compass. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Fragmentation Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes random bones in the body to fracture and explode in random directions. Is almost always ultimately fatal, given that ribs will eventually fracture and usually explode into the heart and lungs.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Freeze Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Glacius Duo is a charm used offensively in duelling to freeze a target enemy in ice. It is a more powerful version of Glacius, but was not as powerful as Glacius Tria.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Freezing Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Trace a quick spiral in the air then jab the wand at the target.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Freezing Charm halts the movement of living creatures or objects, rendering them motionless for a short period【493772652969502†L64-L69】. It is commonly used on swarming creatures like Cornish pixies or to stop moving objects in an emergency.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Casting this charm produces a faint icy aura around the target and should not be confused with the Full Body‑Bind Curse. It appears in Defence Against the Dark Arts lessons and provides a gentler means of immobilisation for intermediate students.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Freezing Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Freezing Spell (Glacius) is a charm that freezes a target with icy-cold air created from the tip of the wand. This, in turn, can freeze water, extinguish fires, and cool off Fire Dwelling Salamanders.This charm has the unfortunate side-effect of making the breath of anyone nearby turn into thick white mist due to the extreme frigidity caused by the spell's casting.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Frozen Life Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes collapse, reduction in body temperature, slowed breathing and progress of bodily fluids. Limbs remain mobile.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Furnunculus Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the target to become covered in boils. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Gardening Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Herbivicus Charm, also known as the Herbivicus Spell or Gardening Charm, (Herbivicus) is a charm used to rapidly increase the growth rate of plants and cause flowers to bloom. Herbivicus Duo was a stronger version of this charm.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: General Counter-Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Negates many spells or the effects of many spells. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Gouging Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Can carve or dig out materials, such as stone and steel. It had practical applications, both in digging and in making passageways through solid rock.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Great Exploding Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Bombarda Maxima is the incantation used for the strongest variation of the Exploding Charm. It provokes large, violent explosions capable of demolishing entire walls.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Great Fire Making Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: It is a stronger variation of the Fire-Making Spell (Incendio), but not as strong as Incendio Maxima. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Great Freezing Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Glacius Tria is a charm used offensively in duelling to freeze a target enemy. It was the most effective version of Glacius, being more powerful than Glacius Duo.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Great Hard Shield
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Protects a very large area against Dark Magic objects and spells. It causes anything within the ranges of Dark Magic to rebound off the shield.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Great Wand-Lighting Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Lumos Duo is a variation of the Wand-Lighting Charm, Lumos. It creates a focused beam of light from the end of the wand.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Greater Fire Making Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This charm was an improvement over both Incendio and Incendio Duo, and consequently created larger flames than either spell. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Greater Wind Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Ventus Duo was the incantation of a stronger variant of the the spell Ventus. The spell created a stronger jet of spiralling wind than the standard version, which could cause more damage to an opponent in a wizard's duel.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Gust Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Produces a blast of moving air from the tip of the wand, of comparable strength to a leaf-blower.Based on Windy Spell The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Hair Loss Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Hair Loss Curse (Calvorio) is a curse that removed the victim's hair or headdress. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Hard Shield
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Creates a hard magical barrier, which reflects back the spell directed at it to the attacker. Caster feels resistance and force from the attack and may be forced backwards.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Hardened Shield
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Creates a hard magical barrier, which reflects back the spell or object directed at it to the attacker. Will fail under heavy attack, weaker than Durus, Maxima, Totalus.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Heart Stopping Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This spell instantly thickens and slows the muscles of the heart to cause severe chest pain and difficulty breathing. As the heart is directly targeted, abnormal heart rhythms and the strain of beating can make this fatal in most cases.To muggle doctors, it would appear to be like the condition hypertrophic cardiomyopathy.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Heating Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Increases the temperature of the target, the more intense the caster's focus the hotter the heat. Also works like a Drying Charm if liquids on the target can boil away as steam.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Hex Deflection Enchantment
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Provides some form of protection against hexes. Taught in fifth year Defence Against the Dark Arts at Hogwarts.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Hiccup Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Gives the target a violent bout of hiccups that can only be cured when the hex is removed. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Hole Blasting Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Deprimo was the incantation of a charm used to blast holes in the ground. It was strong enough to shatter the floor of an entire room in a matter of seconds.It conjures a very powerful wind that can loosen and/or soften a variety of things; it can also be used to detach objects.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Hot Air Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes hot air to shoot from the wand, which dries whatever is in its path, or melts things which would normally be melted by hot air (such as snow). Lasts until the caster stops it.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.
