charmwork_enchantment.name: Hot-Foot Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes a burning pain in the soles of the victim's feet, particularly in sensitive places such as the arch. The caster can keep the pain going as long as their wand is pointed at the target; once the path between wand and feet is broken, the spell stops.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Human Recognition Enchantment
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Enchants an object to recognize a certain person or multiple people's aura. Can be combined with other enchantments.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Human-presence-revealing Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Human-presence-revealing Spell (Homenum Revelio) is a charm which reveals the presence of other humans in the surrounding environment. The spell indicates a body by a marker which can be felt by the target as something "swooping" low over them.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Hurling Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes brooms to vibrate violently in the air and try to buck their rider off. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Illegible Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Illegibilus was the incantation of a charm that made writing impossible to read. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Immobilizing Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Immobilizes or restricts the movement of a non-living object by freezing it, i.e. a large object mid-air or a falling item.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Impervius Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This spell makes something repel (literally, become impervious to) substances and outside forces, including water. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Incantation of Brief Pain Relief
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Gives temporary pain relief, can be used in first aid - numbs and calms a little. Legal, Intermediate to Advanced, its relief varies
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

sources.ref: Fandom: Incantation of Brief Pain Relief

charmwork_enchantment.name: Induce Diarrhoea Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Induces (forces) diarrhoea in a patient to evacuate the bowels. Will continue until canceled with finite incantatem.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Induce Vomiting Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Induces (forces) vomiting in a patient to remove something that has been swallowed. Will continue to force vomiting until canceled with finite incantatem.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Inflating Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Inflates target with air. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Insect Protection Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The charm can be cast on particular limbs or, for more practiced users, the entire body. It is an invisible charm that will protect a person from being bothered by insects.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Intruder Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Detects intruders and sounds an alarm. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Jabbing Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Jabs another person or thing in the manner a finger would poke between the ribs. Will continue to jab in similar areas for a few seconds.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Jelly-Brain Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Presumably affects the target's mental processes. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Jelly-Fingers Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Very similar to the Jelly-Legs Jinx, causes the target's fingers wobble unresponsively, as if the bones had been removed, making them incapable of grasping anything. Takes approximately half an hour for all twitches to completely disappear.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Jelly-Legs Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Jelly-Legs Curse, also known as the Jelly-Legs Jinx (Locomotor Wibbly) is a dark charm that causes the victim's legs to collapse as if they were turned to jelly. This spell was covered in Curses and Counter-Curses by Professor Vindictus Viridian.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Jelly-Legs Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the legs to wobble uncontrollably, making standing difficult and walking impossible. Takes approximately half an hour for all twitches to completely disappear.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Knee-Reversal Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the knee joints to reverse themselves, leaving the leg bending backward (like a bird's legs) rather than forward. The reversal itself is momentarily painful, and attempts to walk on reversed legs are very difficult.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Knockback Duo Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Knocks the target backwards. Prominently used for duelling, but can be used to push heavy objects.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Knockback Max Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Flipendo Maxima is a more powerful variation of the Knockback Jinx, which throws the target back further and with greater force that the original spell. Can be used on single targets.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Knockback Tria Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Knocks multiple targets backwards a significant distance. Prominently used for defending against multiple attackers.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Laceration Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Violently wounds the target; described as being as though the subject had been "slashed by a sword". Created by Severus Snape.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Ladder Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: With practise, the caster can ensure the ladder is attached at the top, but always check the ladder with a tug. Will dissipate as smoke after a few minutes.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Leg-Locker Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Locks the legs together, preventing the victim from moving the legs in any fashion. The target can hop when affected by this curse, but walking is impossible without the countercurse
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Lesser Gouging Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Gouges into materials softer than stone and steel to a smaller, more controllable degree. Can be nonverbal.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Levitate Body
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Lifts a body a few inches off the ground and levitates it where the caster points his or her wand The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Levitate Object
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The spell is always used with the name of a target, at which the wand is pointed (e.g. "Locomotor Trunk!").
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Levitate Wood
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Lifts a tree a few inches off the ground and levitates it to where the caster points his or her wand. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Levitation Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a swish and flick upward, emphasising the final syllable.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This charm makes an object or creature levitate and allows the caster to direct its movement through the air. The heavier the object, the more concentration is required, and miscasting can cause the target to drift or fall unpredictably【870017398293065†L445-L476】【870017398293065†L501-L535】.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Invented by Jarleth Hobart, who famously levitated only his own clothes, the Levitation Charm is a staple of first‑year lessons【870017398293065†L501-L535】. Proper pronunciation and wand movement are critical to prevent mishaps.

sources.ref: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 1

charmwork_enchantment.name: Light Sphere Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: With skill, can be directed to hang at a designated location, or be set in motion. The size and brightness of the light varies between casters, and the light fades over time.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Living Statue Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the target to turn to stone, suspended and frozen in the moment the spell was cast. The body will look and feel like stone, and could even break and shatter like stone if you aren't careful.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Localised Defence Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Spell used to strengthen an enclosure from enemies. Produces a boundary that keeps the caster hidden from view.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Lock Fast Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A locking, fastening or bolting charm best used on the locking mechanisms of objects. A general purpose charm.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Locking Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Draw a vertical line over the lock then twist the wrist to seal it.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This charm seals doors or containers so that they cannot be opened manually or with simple unlocking spells【52851342351484†L442-L472】. Strong counter‑charms or more powerful unlocking magic can overcome its effect.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Often paired with the Unlocking Charm in lessons, Colloportus is used to secure rooms and chests. Professor Flitwick taught the spell to fourth‑year students at Hogwarts【52851342351484†L493-L496】.

sources.ref: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 1

charmwork_enchantment.name: Lumos Maxima
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Lumos Maxima was the incantation to a charm that could be used to produce a blinding flash of bright white light from the tip of the wand, a modified version of the Wand-Lighting Charm. Taught in fifth year charms at Hogwarts.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Magic Recognition Enchantment
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Enchants an object to recognize either magic if cast as such, or certain spells or potions if followed in the incantation with the name of the spell or potion. i.e.: Specialis Recogno Imperius Curse.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Memory Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Point the wand at the subject’s head and make a gentle swish followed by a flick upwards.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Memory Charm wipes selected memories from the target’s mind, allowing the caster to remove knowledge of specific events or information【756558620408649†L449-L472】. If miscast or overused it can cause permanent memory loss and confusion, so it requires expert control.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Mnemone Radford developed memory‑modifying charms in the sixteenth century and became the first Ministry Obliviator【756558620408649†L503-L507】. The Memory Charm is covered in The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 2, and Obliviators must be licensed to perform it on Muggles.

sources.ref: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 2

charmwork_enchantment.name: Memory Copy Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Used usually wordlessly, or quietly to copy a memory that has been brought to the surface, and decant into a pensieve or other suitable container. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Memory Extraction Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Used usually wordlessly, or quietly to remove the memory that has been brought to the surface, and decant into a pensieve or other suitable container. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Mending Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Trace the shape of the broken object with the wand tip.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This charm repairs broken or damaged objects by magically joining their pieces together【854752565311166†L447-L481】. It cannot mend magical items such as wands or objects ruined by dark magic【854752565311166†L500-L504】.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Orabella Nuttley famously used the Mending Charm to restore the Colosseum in Rome, demonstrating its power【854752565311166†L500-L504】. The charm is a fundamental household spell taught early at Hogwarts.

sources.ref: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 1

charmwork_enchantment.name: Milling Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A tricky spell to cast, the milling charm requires its caster to have a delicate touch. Clumsy use of it will result in a grind that is either too fine or too rough.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Mind-Reading
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Allows the caster to delve into the mind of the victim, allowing the caster to see the memories, thoughts, and emotions of the victim. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Minor Injury Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Used to heal relatively minor injuries. When this spell is cast, the person feels his/her injured body part go very hot and then very cold.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Muggle-Repelling Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Keeps Muggles away from wizarding places by causing them to remember important meetings they missed and to cause the Muggles in question to forget what they were doing in the first place. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Object Tracking Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Avenseguim is the incantation of a charm that turned a target object into a tracking device. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Obliteration Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Removes things not wished to be seen again. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Opening Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Opens doors. An alternative to Alohomora.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Organ-Stopper Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the struck organ of the target to stop. If this hits a vital organ (brain, heart, lungs), death will occur after a second.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Parchment Repair Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Repairs torn paper, provided that all the pieces are present. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Passage Revealing Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Dissendium is a charm used to open passageways. It can be used on the One-Eyed Witch Passage in the third corridor at Hogwarts castle.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Permanent Sticking Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Makes objects permanently stay in place. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Pixie Repelling Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The one time it was uttered, it had absolutely no effect. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Placement Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A charm which temporarily places an object upon a desired target. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Portkey Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Turns an object into a portkey. The object glows an odd blue colour to show it has been transformed into a portkey, then goes solid again.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Presentation Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This is fairly simple enchantment; it simply displays an image the user imagines onto a surface. While the image itself can move (i.e., be animated) it cannot be changed without recasting the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Primo Incantatum
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The charm shows an echo of the first spells that might have been set upon an object or place. It is often used on burial sites and ancient tombs.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Prohibition Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The use of the Prohibition Jinx is to bind someone to a list of restricted words they cannot utter. To use it, the binder must define the parameters of the jinx.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Protego Diabolica
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Protego Diabolica is the incantation of a powerful dark charm that allows the user to create a protective ring of black fire around them that completely incinerates enemies of the caster who come into contact with it while leaving their allies unharmed. It was similar to Fiendfyre, but was a different spell.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Put Up Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Used to erect something. Erecto is the incantation of a charm that straightened out the target object and set it up.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Quietening Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Makes a magically magnified voice return to normal. The Quietening Charm is a charm used to quieten sounds.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Quieting Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The quieting charm is an advance muffling charm used by Unspeakables. It can be cast three-fold depending on how secure you want your surroundings to be.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Red Sparks
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Red Sparks (Vermillious) is a charm that precipitates a jet of red sparks from the tip of the wand, something that might be useful to signal an emergency and call for help.It can also be used offensively as a minor duelling spell, but it was not effective against armoured or metallic opponents. It was covered in the book The Dark Forces: A Guide to Self-Protection by Quentin Trimble.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Refraction Enchantment
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A long-lasting enchantment that can be applied to both objects and living things, that allows some light to pass through them, like light through water. In broad daylight, it mostly makes a thing appear blurry or wiggly, but in the dark, can be quite concealing.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Revealing Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Tap the targeted surface with the wand tip.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This charm causes invisible ink or other magically concealed writing to become visible. The caster taps the object while speaking the incantation and any hidden text is revealed【836813412696964†L470-L474】.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: The Revealing Charm is widely used by students, teachers and parents to uncover secret messages or invisible ink【836813412696964†L470-L474】. It appears in Miranda Goshawk’s Book of Spells and can be countered by stronger concealment charms or cursed objects【836813412696964†L470-L474】.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Reverse Reveal Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the echo (a shadow or image) of the last spell cast by a wand to emanate from it. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Reverse Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The charm is directed at an intended wand, forcing the wand to regurgitate previous spells. If both wands involved share a core from the same source (such as with Harry Potter + Lord Voldermort), the reverse spell manifests as "priori incantem".
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Revulsion Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A charm used to force someone or something to release that which it holds or grapples by means of shooting fiery sparks out or, underwater, shooting hot bursts of water. See also Emancipare.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Rotation Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Rotates an object. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Scouring Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Draw an 'S' shape in the air and flick downward【746242811815972†L446-L479】.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This charm cleans objects and surfaces by removing dirt, grime and other substances and can even fill a person’s mouth with soap【746242811815972†L446-L479】. It cannot mend broken items and may fail against magically resistant filth.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Featured in Miranda Goshawk’s *Book of Spells*, the Scouring Charm is taught to fourth‑year students as part of household magic【746242811815972†L496-L499】. Overuse can leave a lingering soapy taste or residue.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Seizing Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The spell, when successfully cast and not blocked, will seize all parts of a person painfully and cause them to curl into the fetal position, dropping to the ground as all of their muscles and internal organs are constricted. This incapacitates the subject and causes excrutiating pain.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Separation Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Generally used to separate contaminated potions or ingredients. The spell identifies the differing densities of the matters that make the target and separates them from each other.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Shadow Writing Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Allows the caster's written words to appear on another, previously treated surface. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Shaking Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the target (person or object) to shake violently. If used on a person, can be countered with Consisto.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Shatter Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Finestra spell is a charm which shatters glass. This spell was useful in that it makes very little sound, allowing for discreet entry through a window.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Singing Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Cantis is the incantation of a charm used to make the target break out in song. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Skull Engorgement Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Engorgio Skullus is the incantation of a dark charm used to swell the head of the victim. It is a variation of the Engorgement Charm.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Skurge Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect:
There is a way of cleaning away ectoplasm without resorting to a can of Mrs Skower’s Magical Mess Remover, and this is with an effective scouring charm such as Skurge."— Miranda Goshawk, The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 2, Chapter 6 ⁠(Cleanliness Equals Wizardliness)
The Skurge Charm (Skurge) is a charm that can be used to clean up the sticky green ectoplasm created by passing ghosts. It can also be used to frighten spirits, such as the aforementioned ghosts, as well as poltergeists.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Sleeping Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: An extremely effective sleeping charm that causes its target to immediately fall into a still and dreamless sleep. The length of slumber depends entirely on its caster's skill.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Slowing Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Swing the wand downward then sharply up as if catching a falling object.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This charm decelerates or stops the movement of a falling person or object, cushioning impacts by slowing velocity【216974624592781†L468-L477】. It is invaluable in preventing injuries during accidents and can be used to suspend objects in midair.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Quidditch player Daisy Pennifold invented the Slowing Charm in 1711 to protect players from dangerous falls【216974624592781†L468-L477】. Taught in second- and fifth‑year Charms classes, it must be practised carefully to avoid jolting the target when the momentum is arrested【216974624592781†L482-L486】.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Slug-Vomiting Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A jet of green light strikes the victim, who then vomits slugs for an undefined period of time (greater than five hours). The sizes of the vomited slugs decrease with time.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Smack Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A lighter casting will cause the victim to be knocked back a pace; a more forceful casting will knock him off his feet. Instantaneous.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Smiting Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Blasts a single opponent off his feet and backwards through the air. Instantaneous.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Smoke Shaping Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Shapes smoke (and other visible gasses) into a figure when the caster points their wand at the gas. Figure is determined by the casters imagination and concentration on the figure they want it to be.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Smoke Solidifying Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Will pull smoke from the air of a room, and solidify it into smooth stone rock. Caution must be used when the smoke is a continuing volume, or in a confined area filled with thick smoke, as it increases the weight of the smoke far more than the airborne mass.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Smoke-Clearing Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A spell that cuts through smoke similar to how a boat hull slices through water, causing smoke to roll away from it like a wake. It travels in the direction the wand is pointed at.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Smoke-Screen Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Conjures thick smoke to fill the area and allow for a quick escape. The smoke lingers for only a few minutes after the spell is complete and may take on a twinge of color depending on the caster's personality.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Smokecloud Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Fumos Duo is the incantation for the most powerful version of the Smokescreen Spell. It can conjure multiple clouds of dark red smoke.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Smokescreen Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Smokescreen Spell (Fumos) is a charm used to create a defensive cloud of smoke from the wand that hindered visibility. This spell is quite useful in duelling, as the smoke hides the caster, preventing an opponent from accurately aiming their spells, as well as allowing the caster to escape unseen.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Snare Weaving Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Upon slowly and deliberately uttering the incantation, the caster must quickly gesture their wand in a half-circle towards the material being used to weave a net. The intricacy and nature of the next will depend on the skill and wand movements of the caster.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Sneezing Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Sternius is the incantation of a charm that caused the victim to continually sneeze. This spell is used in duelling to distract and weaken the opponent.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Sound Muffling Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Keeps nearby people, or those to whom the wand is directed, from hearing nearby conversations. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Spectacle Repair Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Oculus Reparo is the incantation of a charm that repaired broken eyeglasses. It is a variant of the Mending Charm, Reparo.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Stair Slide Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the steps on a stairway to flatten and form a ramp or slide.Glisseo is the incantation of a charm that can be used to transform a staircase into a smooth slide. It was very old, having been in use since in the Middle Ages.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Statue Animation
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Spell used to animate statues and suits of armour to do the caster's bidding. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Stickfast Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Stickfast Hex (Colloshoo) is a hex that stuck the target's shoes to the ground, causing them to trip if they attempted to move. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Sticking Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes an object to stick to a surface (usually a wall) without need for hanging hooks. Can also fix objects in place on a floor.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Straight Path Charm
charmwork_enchantment.incantation: Averte Pedeum a Tuum A Malo
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Parts a crowd or other movable object (will not split a solid object in half) to create a pathway, lasting as long as the caster can maintain sufficient focus. See: Moses.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Strangulation Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the target (which must be something that can be constricted, such as a blood vessel or windpipe) to constrict, reducing or cutting off the flow of whatever goes through it as long as the caster’s wand remains aimed at the target. This can make it lethal if aimed at the windpipe or blood vessels of the heart.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Subjugation Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the target to be both disarmed and forced to his knees. Unlike the Disarming Charm, the wand of the victim simply flies away, rather than going to the caster.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Suffoctation Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Pulmonary Obscura is used to restrict the breathing of those that are being cursed. It is invisible, but it creates what could be described as the same feeling that a tight, plastic sealing might feel over one's nose and mouth.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Suitcase-packing Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Packs a trunk, or perhaps any luggage. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Summoning Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Point the wand toward yourself and flick it sharply as if drawing the object in.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: When cast correctly, this charm summons an object toward the caster, even if the object is out of sight. It cannot summon living beings or objects protected by powerful magic.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: One of the oldest known spells, Accio requires a clear mental image of the target and becomes more difficult with distance or mass【749198159033941†L503-L540】. It is introduced to fourth‑year students at Hogwarts and is invaluable for retrieving misplaced items.

sources.ref: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 4

charmwork_enchantment.name: Sunlight Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Lumos Solem Spell is a charm used to produce a blinding flash of sunlight. As Devil's Snare hates sunlight and heat, this particular light-creation spell was quite effective towards subduing it.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Suppress Vomiting Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Suppresses (prevents) vomiting in a patient to force something swallowed not to be regurgitated. Will continue until canceled with finite incantatem or spell duration for more than forty minutes.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Taboo
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A jinx which may be placed upon a word or a name, so that whenever that word is spoken, a magical disturbance is created that alerts the caster of the Taboo to the location of the speaker. Any protective enchantments in effect around the speaker are broken when the Tabooed word is spoken aloud.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Tangible Light Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Makes a tangible ball of light. This ball has the texture of glass, and gives a slight tingling sensation when touched.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Temporary Partition Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Partis Temporus is the incantation of a charm that temporarily parts the target, creating a gap wherever the caster points their wand. This spell was effective in producing a magical partition in a Firestorm.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: The Brain Bleed Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Creates a rupture in the brain tissue of a victim. Depending on the particular flare and intention of the caster, this can cause instantaneous death or be quite prolonged, inducing seizures and other symptoms like slurred speech, headaches, lethargy, and nausea/vomiting.The spell is almost always lethal, unless the counter-curse can be used in time ("Coagulum Cerebrum").
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: The Carving Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The spell causes an object or wand end to cut through a surface. Used on flesh, will not scar if healed with healing magic or poultices.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: The Protean Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes numerous identical objects to mimic changes to a single (also identical) master object. Permanent.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: The Smoothing Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Smooths a lumpy or uneven surface, packing it in until sufficiently flat. Wand movement is a straight, horizontal line.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: The flesh splitting curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Used exclusively nonverbally. It can be used from a distance to slash skin open, or it can be used up close-- for close carving or more intricate slashing as a form of torture.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Throwback Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Everte Statum is the incantation of a charm that caused opponent to fly back several feet, and caused a short sharp pain depending on the strength of the spell, but does not cause any lasting damage. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Tongue Tie Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Glues the victim's tongue to the roof of his/her mouth. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Tongue-Tying Curse
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Tongue-Tying Curse (Mimblewimble), also known as the Tongue-Tying Spell, is a curse that ties the target's tongue in a knot, preventing them from making coherent speech. This feature also allows one to prevent the victim from speaking the incantations of spells correctly, and hence like the Silencing Charm it is useful in duelling (though can be overcome with more advanced magic).
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Tooth Enlargement Hex
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the teeth of the recipient to grow at an alarming rate. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Tracking Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The Tracking Spell is a charm that reveals and illuminates traces of recent magical activity and shows magical footprints and track marks in an area. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Trip Jinx
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes the target to trip and fall. Instantaneous.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Umbrella charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Acts as an umbrella when raining, emitting from the tip of the wand when held upright. Any use of another spell will cancel the umbrella charm.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Unbreakable Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Makes object unable to be broken. Difficulty depends both on the natural fragility of the object and the size of the object.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Unbreakable Vow
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Causes a vow taken by a witch or wizard to be inviolable; if he or she should break it, the consequence is death. It manifests itself as interlinking chains of fire binding the clasped hands of the people taking the Vow; the fire shoots out as a tongue of flame from the wand of the Binder (a witness to the Vow) every time the person who takes the vow makes a promise.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Unlocking Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Tap the lock lightly then twist clockwise with the wand.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This charm unlocks doors, windows and other mechanisms as if using a key. It cannot open locks sealed by strong counter‑charms or ancient protective magic【713512457920767†L470-L523】.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Believed to have originated in African sorcery and brought to Britain in the early seventeenth century, Alohomora is taught to first‑year students【713512457920767†L470-L523】. It is a useful everyday spell but should be used responsibly to avoid trespass.

sources.ref: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 1

charmwork_enchantment.name: Vaulting Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Used to launch an object up into the air. Can be used to fling an opponent into the air.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Ventus Maxima
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Produces a blast of moving air from the tip of the wand, of comparable strength to a localised gale force wind. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Vermillious Duo
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Vermillious Duo is the incantation of a charm that produces a jet of red sparks that can be used offensively in duelling. It was a more powerful version of Vermillious Red Sparks, but it was not as powerful as Vermillious Tria.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Vermillious Tria
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Vermillious Tria is the incantation of a charm that produced a jet of red sparks that could be used offensively in duelling. It is the most powerful version of Vermillious Red Sparks.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Vertigio
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: In order to cast this spell, the wand must be raised above the head and moved in a smooth swirling motion. Those in the room are forced to succumb to a dreadful bout of enhanced vertigo.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Voice amplifying spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Magnifies the spell caster’s voice, functioning as a magical megaphone The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Wad Launching Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Appears to launch small objects through the air. During the 1980s at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, students would use this spell while duelling to shoot gum at their opponent causing some damage
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Wall Building Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: At the will of the caster, bricks or other building stones from a source location animate and come together to form a new structure, usually a wall or series of walls. Certainly, the caster could conjure multiple walls that form a more complex structure.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Wall Fortifying Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: A substantially more difficult and powerful version of the spell Munio. Protects permanent structures against substantial magical or physical bombardment, and is thus usually cast on exterior building walls.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Wand-Light Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Creates a narrow beam of light that shines from the wand's tip, like a torch. The spell has limitations and should be used with care.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Wand‑Lighting Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Flick the wand upward as if igniting a match.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This charm causes the tip of the caster’s wand to emit a beam of white light, illuminating dark areas【802059548633253†L447-L485】. It cannot substitute for sunlight and may be extinguished by the counter‑spell Nox【802059548633253†L500-L511】.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Levina Monkstanley invented the Wand‑Lighting Charm and first demonstrated it at the Ministry of Magic in 1772【802059548633253†L500-L511】. Students learn Lumos early, using it to read at night or explore dim corridors.

sources.ref: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 1

charmwork_enchantment.name: Water‑Making Spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Move the wand in a smooth wave from right to left【383045706419022†L498-L501】.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This charm conjures a stream or jet of clean water from the wand’s tip【383045706419022†L450-L502】. The flow can range from a gentle trickle to a powerful torrent and is ineffective against magical fire like Fiendfyre【383045706419022†L450-L502】.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: Aguamenti is introduced in upper‑level charms classes when students have sufficient control over conjuration. Skilled casters can adjust the volume and pressure for firefighting, watering plants or filling containers.

sources.ref: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 6

charmwork_enchantment.name: Weather-Modifying Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: In the HP wiki. Apparently appears in early grade charms books.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Wide Hard Shield
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Protects a very large area against highly Dark Magic. It causes anything within the ranges of Dark Magic to rebound off the shield.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Wide Shield
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Provides protection of some form for an area or dwelling. Creates a hard magical barrier, which reflects back the spell directed at it to the attacker.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: World's Smallest Violin
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: Triggered by bursts of self-pity, disappointment or outrage. Can be cast on an object or an area, much like a ward.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: Wrap-around spell
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: This spell causes an object to attempt to wrap around an object or person you indicate. The will try to get as tight as possible but will usually not reach a lethal pressure.
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_enchantment.name: X-Ray Charm
charmwork_enchantment.wand_movements: Perform a precise wand movement consistent with the intent of the spell.
charmwork_enchantment.effect: The beam will cause layers to fade away (visibly, though not actually) and show the caster what is underneath (i.e. muscle layer, organ layer, bone).
charmwork_enchantment.notes: This spell is part of wizarding lore predating 1890 or has unknown origins. It should be practised under supervision, as misuse can lead to unintended effects.

charmwork_jinxes.name: Anti-Disapparition Jinx
charmwork_jinxes.wand_movements: Draw a wide circle in the air to cover the desired area.
charmwork_jinxes.effect: This jinx prevents anyone within a designated area from Disapparating, effectively confining them. By anchoring the space to the ground, it neutralises magical teleportation and can be used to protect secure locations or trap opponents.
charmwork_jinxes.notes: Hogwarts’ grounds have been warded with this jinx since ancient times and only the headmaster can lift it【507997908506929†L207-L213】.
